full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Reference Number and Contracting Entity

* **Reference Number (numéro de référence)**: PW-22-01007447
* **Contracting Entity (Entité contractante)**: Department of National Defence

#### Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number (numéro de sollicitation)**: W8482-230759/A
* **Publication Date (date de publication)**: 2022-09-16
* **Tender Closing Date (date limite de soumission)**: 2022-10-26T14:00:00
* **Tender Status (état de l'appel d'offres)**: Expired

#### Goods and Services

We are seeking proposals for a contract to deliver the following items:

* **Pipe Assembly, Metal (Assemblage de tuyaux, métal)**
	+ Item 1: 6 units of Part No. 170158-22-083, NCAGE: L0AV8, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
	+ Item 2: 3 units of Part No. 170158-22-083, NCAGE: L0AV8, to be delivered to CFB Halifax
	+ Item 3: 6 units of Part No. 170158-22-081, NCAGE: L0AV8, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
	+ Item 4: 3 units of Part No. 170158-22-081, NCAGE: L0AV8, to be delivered to CFB Halifax
	+ Item 5: 20 units of Part No. 170158-21-073, NCAGE: L0AV8, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
	+ Item 6: 10 units of Part No. 170158-21-073, NCAGE: L0AV8, to be delivered to CFB Halifax
	+ Item 7: 20 units of Part No. 170158-21-072, NCAGE: L0AV8, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
	+ Item 8: 10 units of Part No. 170158-21-072, NCAGE: L0AV8, to be delivered to CFB Halifax

#### Trade Agreements

* **Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)**
* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement
